60.name: Leonland
60.description: This site right here, which started as an exercise to help me learn HTML5 and CSS3 and has since led me to learn more about JavaScript and static sites.

50.name: Decidedly Different
50.description: Photos of funky stuff I used to see around my old neighborhood in Berkeley, CA.

40.name: Stuff I'm Into
40.description: A tumblr built using IFTTT to automatically post all my favorites from Pinboard, Twitter, and Pocket.

30.name: Work from Homers Club
30.description: A project to build and curate a list of local work-friendly cafes.

20.name: All Things Markdown
20.description: A GitHub repo of resources and files I've used in my presentations about Markdown.

10.name: DJ Leonland
10.description: A site I made to showcase my DJ work and mixtapes hosted on Mixcloud.

8.name: Additional Track Details on Hover
8.description: My capstone project for the Codecademy Intensive "Build Front-End Web Apps from Scratch" course - an application for DJs to access additional track metadata from Spotify to help them create better playlists.

6.name: DJ Playlist Preview
6.description: A web application I co-created that allows DJs to see BPM, key, energy level, and other important details for tracks in their playlists in Spotify.

5.name: Photo Favorites
5.description: A project to help me learn about APIs and Javascript. A gallery of my favorite photos built with the Flickr API.
